INTROTEXT:
It is a crisp autumn day in 2007, I sit next to my mother in the car waiting for the red light.
Rows of boring, solid German and French cars sluggishly start moving& as the light on my left turns green.
Suddenly a small speedy little car buzzes out of the mass of gray beasts.
A bright red mini bounces over the uneven asphalt and leaves the other cars in its wake.
From that moment on I knew; I will once drive such a car!

In april of 2017 that time had come, on speurders.nl I found a mini right near the Belgium border.
It had some issues and needed some tlc, we had to transport the poor thing by trailer,
but the price was right and the mini had potential.
